title: pixel 4a apps not opening
content:
I use my pixel 4a for a month, works beautifully.
all of a sudden - today - apps starting not to open, like brawl stars game, gmail!!!, search bar, ...
this is very annoying as I use gmail for work..
what does not work:
- bottom search bar, I click on it, keyboard appears, I start typing and after 1-2 characters it closes
- app search -> same as above
- gmail opens up for 1 sec, then closes itself, cannot open mails
- brawl stars
- 9gag


what I tried:
- restart
- clean cache
- clean data
- reboot to safe mode (gmail still does not open)
